blogPost.title: What are some good tips for companies who want to develop AI/digital first strategies? Answer by Akshay Sharma, CTO, https://t.co/La19gX4K0g. https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: AI/デジタルファースト戦略を展開したい企業にとって、良いヒントがあれば教えてください。回答者：Akshay Sharma（CTO） https://t.co/La19gX4K0g https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr
对于想要制定人工智能/数字优先战略的公司，有什么好的建议？回答者：Akshay Sharma，CTO，https://t.co/La19gX4K0g。 https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr
對於想要制定人工智能/數字優先戰略的公司，有什麼好的建議？回答者：Akshay Sharma，CTO，https://t.co/La19gX4K0g。 https://t.co/ogAwr104HC https://t.co/Y1fHTScfNr

previous.title: How can I objectively evaluate my business’s worth? Answer by Michelle Seiler Tucker, author of Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit. https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy

localize.full_text: 自分のビジネスの価値を客観的に評価するにはどうしたらいいでしょうか？Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit』の著者、Michelle Seiler Tucker氏による回答です。https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy
我怎样才能客观地评估我的企业的价值？答案：Michelle Seiler Tucker，《Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit》的作者。https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy
我怎樣才能客觀地評估我的企業的價值？答案：Michelle Seiler Tucker，《Exit Rich: The 6 P Method to Sell Your Business for Huge Profit》的作者。https://t.co/nsMJ9Cvn87 https://t.co/lYgVnOmwpy

next.title: How can you identify anti-mentors and use tactics to change the power dynamic? Answer by @ElizaVancort, Author: A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall Raise Your Voice Be Heard. https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB

localize.full_text: アンチメンターを見極め、力関係を変える戦術をとるにはどうすればいいか？回答者：@ElizaVancort（著者）。A Woman's Guide to Claiming Space: Stand Tall Raise Your Voice Be Heard. https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
如何识别反辅导员并使用战术来改变权力动态？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一个女人主张空间的指南。站在高处，提高你的声音被听到。https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
如何識別反輔導員並使用戰術來改變權力動態？回答者：@ElizaVancort，作者。一個女人主張空間的指南。站在高處，提高你的聲音被聽到。https://t.co/vyYONyfJ7y https://t.co/Hv59SIFnrB
